item.description:
Let's get another event on the schedule for our New Haven and Central CT area friends, and extend our Ethnic Food series into Korean BBQ.  Due to other commitments, I am making this dinner a little earlier than most.  I would like to remind people to bring enough cash for your own dinner.  The last restaurant we went to had some problem splitting the check, and it will be easier if everyone can put cash in as needed to cover their portion of the bill.

I hope to see many of you there!

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Ethnic Food Night #4
